spirit:memoryMap.spirit:name: ulp_phymap
spirit:memoryMap.spirit:description: All Registers in the PHY clock domain (250MHz)

spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: ulp_phy
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: All Registers in the PHY clock domain (250MHz)

spirit:register.spirit:name: version
spirit:register.spirit:description: 3.1.0: Changed the Interrupt Pending to avoid blocking the register update when enable is 0 3.2.0: Added pending_irq register

spirit:field.spirit:name: major
spirit:field.spirit:description: Major version

spirit:field.spirit:name: minor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minor version

spirit:field.spirit:name: patch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Patch version

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_swing
spirit:field.spirit:description: TX Voltage Swing Level (0=Full, 1=Low) -See PIPE Spec V3.0 Table 5-3

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_margin
spirit:field.spirit:description: TX Voltage Level (0=Normal Operating Range) -See PIPE Spec V3.0 Table 5-3

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_deemph
spirit:field.spirit:description: TX De-emphasis (0=-6dB, 1=-3.5dB, 2=No De-Emphasis, 3=Reserved -See PIPE Spec V3.0 Table 5-3

spirit:field.spirit:name: reset_n
spirit:field.spirit:description: Resets the TX and RX (***NOTE USED NOW. PLACE HOLDER FOR LATER) -See PIPE Spec V3.0 Table 5-3

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_eq_training
spirit:field.spirit:description: Instructs the RX to bypass normal operation to perform equalization training -See PIPE Spec V3.0 Table 5-3

spirit:field.spirit:name: elas_buf_mode
spirit:field.spirit:description: Elasticity Buffer Mode (Nominal Half Full when 0 and Nominal Empty when 1) -See PIPE Spec V3.0 Table 5-3

spirit:register.spirit:name: compliancy_ctrl
spirit:register.spirit:description: Provides manual access to do the compliancy testing if needed and the right hardware is not available

spirit:field.spirit:name: gen_lfps_ping
spirit:field.spirit:description:
When set, it signals an LFPS ping has been received in the compliancy logic forcing the next compliancy pattern
Write a 1 and HW clears it when completed the action

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration for the ULP PHY Stats

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_8b10b_err
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count of the 8B/10B decoder error in the PHY RX. This is based on the encoding of RxStatus[2:0] in the PIPE Standard

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_elastic_buff_overflow
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count of the Elastic Buffer Overflows in the PHY RX. This is based on the encoding of RxStatus[2:0] in the PIPE Standard

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_elastic_buff_underflow
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count of the Elastic Buffer Underflows in the PHY RX. This is based on the encoding of RxStatus[2:0] in the PIPE Standard

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_disparity_err
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count of the Disparity error in the PHY RX. This is based on the encoding of RxStatus[2:0] in the PIPE Standard

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats1
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration for the ULP logic

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: skp_insert_in_err
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count the number of the erroneous skip injection

spirit:register.spirit:name: crc5_chk_failed
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count the number of detected crc5 errors

spirit:register.spirit:name: crc16_chk_failed
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count the number of detected crc16 errors

spirit:register.spirit:name: dpp_abort
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count the number of DPP abort symbols received in a Transaction Packet

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_framer_ptp_violated
spirit:register.spirit:description: Count the number of PTP Protocol Violation in the RX Frame Manager

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: These are enable for the actual interrupt signals
